me give you some examples so if you think about the US government they are using their cloud if you talk
NASA which is the US Space Agency they're using the cloud regulators and

with the highest standards that you would find in any on-premise environment
and in many cases it's even more secure the second myth that we hear about is

where it resides and that is applicable not just to users like yourselves that

invariably when someone is serving the NDF c-segment is India the data will be
